name: Jackson Spalding
description: Jackson Spalding is one of the largest independent marketing communications agencies in the Southeast, with more than 140 team members in offices in Atlanta, Athens, and Dallas. We provide full-service brand awareness strategies, tactics and execution for The Coca-Cola Company, Delta Air Lines, Toyota, Chick-fil-A, Cousins Properties, Children’s Healthcare of Atlanta, Orkin, SCANA Energy, Primrose Schools, Publix Super Markets, and The University of Georgia.

locations.address: Skyline Terrace 125 West Washington St. Suite 775,
